content.text:
Which of the following regions is the main part of the neuron that contains neurotransmitter receptors (i.e. recieves incoming messages)? <image 1>

A. A
B. B
C. C
D. D
E. E
F. F

The main part of the neuron that contains neurotransmitter receptors is the dendrites (A, which receive incoming messages. Therefore, the correct answer is:

A. A
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
